courseName: Complete MERN Stack Web Development Bootcamp
courseDescription: Master the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and build full-stack web applications from scratch. This comprehensive bootcamp covers everything from basics to advanced concepts including authentication, payment integration, and deployment.
whatYouWillLearn: Build production-ready web applications, Master React hooks and Redux, Create RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, Work with MongoDB database, Implement authentication and authorization, Integrate payment gateways, Deploy applications to cloud platforms
instructions: Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript required
Enthusiasm to learn and build projects

courseDescription: Take your React skills to the next level with advanced patterns, performance optimization, testing, and best practices. Learn hooks in-depth, custom hooks, Context API, Redux Toolkit, and modern React patterns.
whatYouWillLearn: Master advanced React patterns, Optimize React performance, Write unit and integration tests, Build scalable React applications, Use Redux Toolkit effectively, Implement server-side rendering

courseName: Data Science with Python - Complete Guide
courseDescription: Comprehensive course covering data analysis, visualization, machine learning, and deep learning using Python. Work with real-world datasets and build predictive models.
whatYouWillLearn: Python programming for data science, Data manipulation with Pandas, Data visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn, Machine learning algorithms, Deep learning with TensorFlow, Statistical analysis and hypothesis testing
instructions: Basic programming knowledge helpful but not required
